name: Trip 2
overview: Made in 1995, after releasing 'Keith's Quest' the same year on F1 Licenseware. Though complete, Trip 2: Trip War was never released until now. It is a two-player only strategy-dogfighting hybrid. You are daring pilots of lightning-fast Trip Ships in the year 2060, embroiled in a bitter war. Who will be victorious? The aim is to shoot down your opponent, while collecting powerups to increase your speed, shot power and shield. In War Mode, the players must also play a turn-based strategy game to aquire territory on the map, building and upgrading while sending your Trip Ships into combat.
